pkgmetadata.longdescription: The Self-Consistent, Competing Risks (SC-CR) Algorithms // An algorithm for producing fully non-parametric and self- consistent estimators of the cause-specific failure probabilities in the presence of interval-censoring data. See Adamic P., Caron S. (2014) doi:10.1080/03461238.2012.693457, Adamic P., Dixon S., Gillis D. (2010) doi:10.1080/03461230903134780, Turnbull B. (1976) doi:10.1111/j.2517-6161.1976.tb01597.x.
